name: Hello You
description:
Hello You is a cute 3D constellation puzzle game about fallen stars. Align the constellations to finish each level. Global Game Jam 2021

Hello You was made for the Global Game Jam 2021, with the theme of "Lost and Found".

Diversifiers: 

Destination: Happy Place - (Sponsored by Unity)

Make a game that includes the journey or process (a location, an activity, an idea, people, and so on) to get to a place or state of mind that makes you happy.

Double Take

Have moments in your game that have a different meaning when seen from another angle (like an ambigram).

Starlight

Your game world is inspired by stars and constellations.

Controls:

All you'll need is a mouse and keyboard!

Credits: 

Team: 

Scott Simpson

Game Design, Narrative Design, Writing, Gameplay & Cutscene Programming

 

Cari Watterton

UI Design, UI & Puzzle Programming, Assorted Bespoke Sounds & 3D Assets
